alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 18 at 12:44PM CST until January 18 at 1:15PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CST FOR WESTERN UNION COUNTY... At 1244 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Wesson, or 7 miles southwest of El Dorado, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... El Dorado around 1255 PM CST. Norphlet around 105 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Newell, Hillsboro and Catesville. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
